refnamediv.refpurpose: File chooser widget that can be embedded in other widgets.

refsynopsisdiv.title: Synopsis

refsect1.title: Implemented Interfaces
refsect1.para: GtkFileChooserWidget implements AtkImplementorIface, GtkFileChooser and GtkFileChooserEmbed.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: GtkFileChooserWidget is a widget suitable for selecting files. It is the main building block of a GtkFileChooserDialog. Most applications will only need to use the latter; you can use GtkFileChooserWidget as part of a larger window if you have special needs.
Note that GtkFileChooserWidget does not have any methods of its own. Instead, you should use the functions that work on a GtkFileChooser.

refsect2.title: gtk_file_chooser_widget_new ()
refsect2.para: Creates a new GtkFileChooserWidget. This is a file chooser widget that can be embedded in custom windows, and it is the same widget that is used by GtkFileChooserDialog.

listitem.simpara: Open or save mode for the widget

refsect2.title: gtk_file_chooser_widget_new_with_backend ()
refsect2.para: Creates a new GtkFileChooserWidget with a specified backend. This is especially useful if you use gtk_file_chooser_set_local_only() to allow non-local files. This is a file chooser widget that can be embedded in custom windows and it is the same widget that is used by GtkFileChooserDialog.

listitem.simpara: Open or save mode for the widget
The name of the specific filesystem backend to use.
